name: Liar's Dice (Tampered)
description:
In Development

A simple game of Liar's Dice against a single person. There are some known issues with the code:

  • You can bet the same thing twice
  • The bet button should be deactivated during the Roll Section
  • I want to change the listboxes to numboxes

    • I will fix these in the upcoming months as well as add some better graphics to the whole.
